Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.motor

Provides the classes and interfaces of the MEKON Frames Mechanism API (see uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon for general description).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CAnnotationsEditor
    Provides mechanisms for editing a specific CAnnotations object.
    CBuilder
    Provides mechanisms for building a Frames Model (FM), as represented by a CModel.
    CBuildListener
    Listener for events occuring during with the CModel build process.
    CFrameEditor
    Provides mechanisms for editing a specific CFrame object.
    CFrameSlotOrders
    Responsible for defining the required ordering, for purposes of presentaion to an end-user, of the slots associated with specific CFrame objects.
    CSectionBuilder
    Interface for mechanisms that will build a section of the model.
    CSlotEditor
    Provides mechanisms for editing a specific CSlot object.
    CStringConfig
    Provides format-specific configuration for CString objects.
    IEditor
    Provides mechanisms for "under-the-hood" editing of CModel instantiations.
    IFrameEditor
    Provides mechanisms for editing a specific IFrame object.
    IReasoner
    Provides mechanisms for initialising the sets of slots for specific instance-level frames, and for dynamically updating those sets based on the current states of the frames.
    ISlotEditor
    Provides mechanisms for editing a specific ISlot object.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CNumberFactory
    Factory for CNumber objects.
    CStringFactory
    Factory for custom CString objects.
    IClassification
    Represents the results of an (@link IFrame}-classification as enacted via an IClassifier object.
    IClassifier
    Provides classification-based versions of the reasoning mechanisms defined by IReasoner.
    IClassifierOps
    Specifies the type(s) of classification operations required.
    IFreeCopier
    Responsible for generating "free-instance" versions of existing instance-level frame/slot networks.
    IReasonerDefault
    Provides the default version of the reasoning mechanisms defined by IReasoner.
    IRelaxedInstantiator
    Responsible for regenerating previously existing instance-level frame/slot networks, without performing the normal reasoning operations that would be required if the networks were being built up from scratch.
    ISlotSpecs
    Utility class that enables implementations of IReasoner to maintain a set of specifications defining the set of slots required for a specific instance-level frame.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ISlotOps
    Represents the types of update operation connected with instance-level slots that can be performed as the result of reasoning.

Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model.motor Description

Provides the classes and interfaces of the MEKON Frames Mechanism API (see uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon for general description).

NOTE: This is a companion package to the uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.model package, with which it shares circular dependencies at the implementation level, though not at the API level. See uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon for further details.
